course_title: Contextual Education Elective: Faith & Justice in the Prophets
class_notes: (Concurrent enrollment in CE 552ANGb, TPb, 552b required; permission number required to enroll; request permission by contacting  candlerregistrar@emory.edu   prior to pre-registration) (HYFLEX: class meets in person on campus; students who need to participate remotely for the semester should request permission in advance by emailing Dr. Joel Kemp)
course_description: Contextual Education Elective for students in Con Ed II, Teaching Parish II, or EASP II and focused on themes of faith and justice within the prophetic books of the Old Testament.
schedule_location: TTh 10am-11:20am in Rita Anne Rollins Building_501
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5222, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:20a, Instructor: J. Kemp, Status: Closed
